ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Summary: Broken Illusions And Escapes: Cobra Commander ok's the attack on PIT III by Dr. Mindbender as a diversion while Destro and the Dreadnoks free the Baroness, as Spirit falls(?) to stop a lone B.A.T. armed w/explosives set to blow up the PIT. Snake-Eyes is freed from the late Dr. Venom's control by Storm Shadow using the Arashikage mindset, returning his sword brother back to normal (Snake-Eyes failing his own attempt last issue by way of Venom's actions inside his mind via the scanner), but Billy is still under Venom's influence.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-08 14:58:23. [CVDB266642] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 14:35:07. [Issue ID 814912]

(Battle Android Troopers),Baroness (freed this issue),Ripper,Gyro-Viper],Psyche-Out,Cobra troopers,Destro,Stalker,Snake-Eyes (freed this issue)
